message: Dear {{ doc.lead_name }}, Thank you for meeting {% set var = frappe.db.get_value("User", doc.lead_owner, "full_name") %} {{var}}. Hope we were able to fulfil your requirement. For more details please contact: {% set var = frappe.db.get_value("User", doc.lead_owner, "full_name") %} {{var}} - {% set var2 = frappe.db.get_value("User", doc.lead_owner, "mobile_no") %} {{var2}} , he will be your relationship manager. - Team Switch My Loan
name: Meeting Conducted SMS
subject: Meeting Conducted
